item.title: [Solved] How do i create fishing spots?
item.dc:creator: @sriahciboon sriahciboon
item.description:
@sriahciboon wrote:

Sorry Vain, i wasnt trying to be a prick…

I was lauphing becouse the whole time we were searching for Global object,
all i needed to do was go to Npchander…

Unfortunatly, im still suck on delta. :P[quote=“demonlover14, post:5, topic:347869”]You guys are dumb.
To add a fishing spot its an NPC.
Not an object.
You’d add the NPC ID of the fishing spot.
Just search Fishing in the NPC list on Rune-----L-O-C-U-S.
Or Fish, untill you find it.[/quote]
I hope you were talking to him when you referd to one of us as being a prick. I dont want to be a prick. :’(

I <3 U IvainI

You have been very helpfull since day one of rsps’ing on mopar

Read full topic

item.title: [Solved] How do i create fishing spots?
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

You guys are dumb.
To add a fishing spot its an NPC.
Not an object.
You’d add the NPC ID of the fishing spot.
Just search Fishing in the NPC list on Rune-----L-O-C-U-S.
Or Fish, untill you find it.

Read full topic

This is what im seeing right now…

public void NewObjects() { makeGlobalObject(9398, 3706, 564, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2974, 3372, 2783, 0, 10);

Am i making a new Global object?

If i am, problem now is that i dont know the code for “fishing spot”
